article.title: Northrop Grumman Wins $125 Million Contract for Airborne Electronic Attack Systems
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Northrop Grumman Corporation has received a firm-fixed-price, 31-month contract from the U.S. Navy for additional improved capability III airborne electronic attack systems for its fleet of EA-6B Prowlers. The contract has a potential value of more than $125 million.
